{{Joke feature}}
{{wip}}
'''Player Unlocks''' are a feature added in [[25w14craftmine]]. They allow the player to purchase upgrades for [[Experience]].

The Player Unlocks menu can be opened from a button inside the player's inventory, or by pressing {{Key|U}}.

== Trivia ==
* The total [[experience]] cost of every single non-hidden unlock is 2,847 levels.
* The player unlock "Descendant of Sif" is a reference to the Dark Souls boss, Great Grey Wolf Sif, who also uses a sword in its mouth.{{citation needed}}
* The in-game description of player unlock "Master Magic Kit" is a reference to a Star Wars quote.{{citation needed}}
